## Http2Server class

HTTP2 Server with enhanced SSL/TLS configuration management and graceful shutdown

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Http2Server extends BaseServer<Http2ServerOptions> 
```
**Extends:** BaseServer&lt;Http2ServerOptions&gt;
